content.html: For 18 years of being out of the military, I have tried to have a little longer hair, mainly because my wife preferred it. I think I may have to go back to a high and tight. Hair is annoying.

summary:
In my quest to use less plastic and try to buy one item that lasts forever, I got myself a new razor instead of buying more plastic cartridge refills. I purchased the Leaf Twig single-blade razor.
The Twig is a metal body razor that takes standard safety blades. It has a twist open with a little magnetism to help seat the blade. So the razor is 100% metal. I did my first shave with it this morning with a bit of scruff on my face since I hadn‚Äôt shaved in about a week while waiting for it.
					Continue reading ‚Üí

content.html:
I find myself wondering how much stuff that is considered racist just happened? Like without a plan; it just ended up that way as compared to things purposefully created like various racist organizations and hate groups, laws, etc..

#thought
